<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sunrod](/Equipment.aspx?ID=137)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 554 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This 1-foot-long, gold-tipped rod glows after it’s struck on a hard surface. For the next 6 hours, it sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light to the next 40 feet).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Sunrod
